note.p: Engineer. Son of Alfred Russel Wallace and his wife, Annie. Engineering apprentice at J. H. Holmes & Co. of Newcastle-upon-Tyne. Worked at Houston Thomson, an electrical engineering firm in Newcastle and Rugby. Associate, Institution of Electrical Engineers, 1894. Travelled, worked, and collected for a time in the United States.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 7 September 2019)
UK, Electrical Engineer membership forms, 1871–1901 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 7 September 2019)
